welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kingston, Canada! Known for its historic charm and beautiful waterfront, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer."

restaurants.name: Hilli Restaurant
restaurants.description: Hilli Restaurant is a australian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Collins Bay Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Collins Bay Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
